chinese: .旋律，悦耳的音乐
english: melody

chinese: 他用钢琴弹奏了一段美妙的旋律。
english: He played a beautiful melody on the piano

chinese: n. 消化系統
english: digestion

chinese: 人的消化系统包括食道、胃和肠等。
english: Human's digestion includes esophagus, stomach, intestines and so on

chinese: n.鷹
english: hawk

chinese: 这只鹰停在了树枝上。
english: The hawk perched on the branch

chinese: adv.各自，分别
english: respectively

chinese: 凯特和金伯莉这对双胞胎姐妹分别收到了玩具车和洋娃娃作为礼物。
english: The twins, Kate and Kimberley, received gifts of a toy car and a doll respectively

chinese: Qdj.极高的，巍峨的
english: lofty

chinese: 这座巍峨的山峰高耸入云。
english: This mountain's lofty peak towers through the clouds

chinese: 几.恶意，怨恨
english: malice

chinese: 他扎自行车轮胎完全是出于恶意。
english: He punctured the bicycle tyres out of pure malice

chinese: n. 基督教徒 ad），基督教的，基督教徒的
english: Christian

chinese: 这一家人都是基督教徒。
english: Everyone in this family is a Christian

chinese: n.阴谋；诡计 v密谋；欺骗；引起极大兴趣
english: intrigue

chinese: 他的脑中突然浮现出一个邪恶的阴谋。
english: An evil intrigue suddenly comes to his mind

chinese: 1.云；云状物
english: cloud

chinese: 你不觉得这朵云看起来像一颗心吗？
english: Don't you think the cloud looks like a heart?

chinese: V.期满，（期限）终止
english: expire

chinese: 这张卡已经到期了，让我帮你剪掉吧。
english: This card is already expired, so let me cut it up for you

chinese: 产生（热、电等能量）
english: generate

chinese: 这个人骑着自行车来发电。
english: The man is riding the bicycle to generate electricity

chinese: L使⋯•润滑；给…••加润滑油
english: lubricate

chinese: 我给车子的部件上了润滑油，让它们能更好地工作。
english: I lubricate my car parts so they work better

chinese: n.五金器具
english: hardware

chinese: 他从那家店买了很多五金器具。
english: He bought a lot of hardware from that store

chinese: V.把......归因于；把：⋯归属于
english: ascribe

chinese: 我们可以把他的病归因于过度的工作压力。
english: We can ascribe his illness to undue work pressure

chinese: 2，机构；制度；惯例；习俗
english: institution

chinese: 这家英语培训机构很受家长和孩子的欢迎。
english: This English language institution is very popular with parents and their children alike

chinese: n.， 大理石；（游戏用的）玻璃弹子
english: marble

chinese: 这地板是由大理石制成的。
english: The floor is made of marble
